sections.content: Frontend / Fullstack Developer with 3+ years of experience building scalable, production-grade web applications. Self-taught with a strong real-world, project-based background. Experienced in remote collaboration, system-level thinking, and delivering real-world solutions for startups, government platforms, and decentralized exchanges.
